title.narrative: Afghanistan: Sustainable Development of Natural Resources Project II

description.narrative: to assist the Ministry of Mines (MoM) and the National Environmental Protection Agency (NEPA) in further improving their capacitiesto effectively regulate Afghanistan‘s mineral resource development in a transparent and efficient manner, and foster private sectordevelopment.

title.narrative: Percentage of sites in Aynak Valley with antiquities where protection activities have started versus total number of sites within the red zone
Staffing and annual budget for the compliance office at NEPA

target.value: Additional staff positons identified and in the process of being filled.

actual.value: The contract of Consultancy Services for Building Regulatory Capacity in the National Environmental Protection Agency was awardedto SIM S.p.A and commenced their work on 1st Sep. 2014 and completed on 30th June 2016. All the required tasks were fulfilled bythe consultancy during their assignment.

title.narrative: Cumulative number of tenders for larger mining and hydrocarbon deposits
Production data collected and reported for medium scale and for large scale mining and hydrocarbon operations
Field investigation reports for HSE compliance at medium and large scale mining and oil/gas operations (reports prepared, issued, corrective actions taken by operator)
Percent of Women trained (as a percentage of total trained) in gemstone cutting, polishing and jewelry making.
% of new geodata collected as a percentage to total area
Number of days to process medium scale licenses
Publication of a new Mining Sector Development Strategy and new policies and plans regarding quarrying and ASM mining

baseline.value: Overarching national Extractive IndustriesExcellence Program (NEIEP) published in draft

target.value: ASM Mining plan approved and published

actual.value: One main and 18 individual policies including ASM have been made approved and published.

title.narrative: Number of inspectors trained in inspecting appropriate mining techniques and environmental management
Annual Report for contract compliance monitoring of Aynak and Hajigak prepared and publicly disseminated
NEPA Promulgates sector standards for mining

target.value: Final draft standard tabled for adoption
